name: Meme Simulator
description:
Go viral or die trying...

This game is my first attempt at a game in Python.

Any feedback, or ideas will be very much appreciated, ENJOY!

--Features--
  • Memes will be effected by events like being shared and, association with people or groups
  • You can set when a meme will die, so you can see how popular a meme will be in X days.
  • When the meme dies, you can see some statistics about it! (Average Rating, Best Rating, Worst Rating)
  • See people talk about your meme depending on the rating of your meme
--Launching--

If the game wont launch try these!

>Install python 2.7

>check to see if you have the following DLLs

All DLLS can be checked at C:WINDOWS\system32

  • USER32.dll
  • SHELL32.dll
  • ADVAPI32.dll
  • WS2_32.dll
  • GDI32.dll
  • KERNEL32.dll
--Compatibility--

I only have a computer running windows, so I cant find out if it will run on other systems. If you have a different operating system, and are having issues tell me, and I will try my best to fix it. Also report bugs!
